Steak & Eggs

Tags: lowcarb , other , breakfast

Ingredients

  • 1 (8oz) Steak
  • 2 Eggs
  • Kosher Salt
  • Black Pepper (freshly ground)

Directions

  1. Combine Ingredients
  2. Cook that shit
  3. Eat it
